subscription.next_order_error: There was an error setting the subscription's next order date.
subscription.address_update_failed: We encountered an unknown error. Please try again.
subscription.pause_disclaimer_date: We will postpone your subscription. Your subscription will remain active, but you will not be charged until {{date}}. You can pause indefinitely or reschedule anytime.
subscription.pause_disclaimer_indefinitely: You will not be charged while your subscription is paused. Reactivate your subscription anytime in your account.
subscription.reactivate_success: Your subscription has been successfully reactivated.
subscription.reactivate_error: Something went wrong while reactivating your subscription. Please try again

subscription.code_received: You must have received a confirmation code in the provided phone number.
subscription.code_enter: Please enter the code below to verify your phone number.
subscription.failed_payment_message: Failed payment with saved method. We will automatically retry payment.

subscription.update_line_success: Subscription updated. The order will ship out as soon as possible.

sms.title: Text updates
sms.enable_phone_text: Text messages allow you to update subscriptions on the go. Message and. data rates may apply.
sms.invalid_country: Only US and CA phone numbers are supported.

frequency.title: Update frequency instead of losing subscription
frequency.subtitle: By updating your delivery frequency, you can control how often you recieve shipments.
frequency.formTitle: You control how often your receive deliveries. Upcoming orders will be delivered on the frequency selected below.

address.promptTitle: Moving doesn’t have to mean cancellation
address.promptSubtitle: By updating your address, you have the option of keeping your subscription with you wherever you go!
address.noShippingOptions: There are no shipping options available for that address.
address.confirmTitle: The price of shipping for your subscription will change from {{oldPrice}} to {{newPrice}} because your new address is in a different delivery zone.

pause.title: Did you know you can pause instead?
pause.description: Instead of cancelling, pausing your subscription allows you to keep billing and shipping details saved when you’re ready to reactivate your subscription.

skip.title: You can skip or reschedule your next order
skip.description: Keep your shipments coming once you’re back from your trip. Consider skipping or rescheduling instead of canceling.
skip.success: Your next order has been rescheduled to {{date}}

reschedule.description: Your subscription will remain active, but we will postpone your subscription until the date you select below.
